articles.title: Workers in North and South Pledge to Hold Football Match for Reunification
articles.content:
Workers in North and South Pledge to Hold Football Match for Reunification 
 Pyongyang, December 1 (KCNA) -- The north and south committees for the promotion of the football match between workers in the north and the south for reunification issued a joint declaration on Monday in which they solemnly declared that they would open the football match at any cost in 2015, the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation, the lapse of 70 years since its division and the 15th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration.
					 The declaration said that all workers in the north and the south are now determined to put an end to distrust and confrontation in 2015, the significant year, and usher in the second June 15 era of reunification in which the atmosphere of reconciliation, unity, peace and reunification will run high.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 Firstly, we will take the lead in the struggle for opening the gate of contact, visit and meeting for reunification, holding aloft the banner of the north-south joint declarations.
					
					 Workers in the north and the south will surely hold an event for reunification despite any obstacles and difficulties in 2015.
					
					 This event will serve as the start of national reconciliation, peace and movement for reunification in the coming year. The event of workers in the north and the south for reunification on May Day, 2015 will also serve as the starting-point in making the meeting for reunification to mark the 70th anniversary of the country's liberation and the 15th anniversary of the June 15 joint declaration a great festival venue of the whole nation for reunification.
					
					 Secondly, workers in the north and the south will again play the role of the eldest son for achieving reunification and a model in solidarity and practice.
					
					 We will carry on all practices and actions for successfully holding the football match for reunification by the concerted efforts of the workers in the north and the south, regarding today as a day of start full of faith and conviction.
					
					 We will put it into practice together with organizations and figures of all strata aspiring after successful football match for reunification and carry on ceaseless actions against all hurdles lying in the way of holding the match.
					
					 Thirdly, we ardently appeal to the people from all walks of life desirous of peace and reunification to positively support the holding of the football match and work hard for it.
					
					 There are no differing ideologies and isms in the movement for reunification. Peace is desired by all classes and strata.
					
					 The workers in the north and the south will achieve widespread solidarity and alliance with people of all social standings, irrespective of ideology, ism, political view and religious belief and thus achieve nationwide trend towards peace and reunification.
					
					 They will become the most powerful engine for significantly marking 2015 by their concerted efforts.
					
					 We are convinced once again that the football match will offer an important occasion for mending the north-south relations, reenergizing widespread exchange and cooperation between people of all strata and stirring up the atmosphere of national reconciliation, unity and peace.
					
					 Reunification has become an irresistible demand of history.
					
					 All workers in the north and the south declare that they will fulfill their responsibility and role by working hard for reunification.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets President of Central African Republic
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets President of Central African Republic
 Pyongyang, December 1 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, sent his greetings to Catherine Samba-panza, president of the Central African Republic, Monday on the occasion of the 56th anniversary of the proclamation of the republic.
					 The message wished the president and people of Central Africa success in their efforts for achieving national unity, stability and economic development and expressed belief that the traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would invariably develop.

articles.title: Ethiopian President Hopes for Steady Development of Relations of Cooperation with DPRK
articles.content:
Ethiopian President Hopes for Steady Development of Relations of Cooperation with DPRK
 Pyongyang, December 1 (KCNA) -- I hope that the cooperative relations between Ethiopia and the DPRK will continue to develop in the common interests of the peoples of the two countries in the future, too.
					 Ethiopian President Mulatu Teshome said this when meeting with DPRK Ambassador to Ethiopia Kim Hyok Chol who paid a farewell call on him on November 25.

articles.title: World AIDS Day Marked in DPRK
articles.content:
World AIDS Day Marked in DPRK
 Pyongyang, December 1 (KCNA) -- An event was held on World AIDS Day at the People's Palace of Culture on Monday.
					 Present at the event were officials in the field of public health, officials concerned, WHO representative here, the UN resident coordinator and concurrently resident representative of the UNDP here, staff members of missions of international organizations here and diplomatic envoys of different countries here. 
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 Speakers underlined the importance of eliminating occurrence of the AIDS cases and casualties and ensuring the rights of the AIDS cases.
					
					 They called for conducting brisk hygienic information service and monitoring to prevent the infection and spread of AIDS.
					
					 The participants of the event were briefed on the activities for preventing and controlling AIDS conducted in the DPRK this year.
					
					 They watched a video on preventing the infection of AIDS and Ebola and enjoyed a performance given by a hygienic information service group of students.
					
					 On the same day there took place intensive information service for preventing AIDS at hygienic information service halls in Pyongyang and provincial capitals.

articles.title: DPRK Official Flails U.S. for Ebola Virus
articles.content:
DPRK Official Flails U.S. for Ebola Virus
 Pyongyang, December 1 (KCNA) -- It is just the U.S. imperialism, chief mastermind of evils, that poses a serious threat to humankind's existence, said Kim Hyok Hwan, a department director of the C.C., DPRK Red Cross Society. 
					 Referring to the fact that the deadly Ebola virus has been reported to be spread by the U.S., stunning the world community, Kim told KCNA:
					
					 As an aide to ex-President Reagan disclosed, the U.S. has been bent on the development of bio-weapons for its supremacy over the world. In the course it invented a progenitor of Ebola virus for the purpose of launching a biological warfare. 
					
					 The U.S. Department of Defense paid 140 million dollars to a foreign pharmaceutical firm for research into Ebola virus and chose African countries as a bio-weapon testing ground, according to a Liberian professor. 
					
					 The world media reported that Ebola cases broke out after some American members of the Medecins sans frontieres (MSF) toured Africa. 
					
					 Russian, Singaporean and American newspapers criticized that the U.S. developed anti-Ebola virus vaccine through experiment on Ebola contagion, but has prevented this vaccine from being known to the world, only for its own interests.
					
					 As admitted by the U.S. Department of Health and Human Services, the U.S. imperialists have long conducted vivisections with fatal epidemics, inflicting untold sufferings on mankind.
					
					 AIDS, known as pest in the 20th century, was also developed by the U.S. imperialist homicides, and it still remains an incurable epidemic. 
					
					 The U.S. imperialists did not hesitate to massacre hundreds of thousands of civilians with A-bombs and make peaceful fishermen a guinea pig for H-bomb only to realize their wild design.
					
					 As already known to everyone, the U.S. is the world's biggest nuke possessor. 
					
					 Nevertheless, the U.S. launches "human rights" racket against other countries even by abusing international bodies. 
					
					 Peace and prosperity can never settle in this planet as long as the U.S. imperialism remains unpunished. 
					
					 All people and organizations aspiring after peace and justice in the world should turn out in a struggle to exterminate the U.S. imperialism, chief mastermind of evils.

articles.title: News Analyst on Killings by U.S. Police
articles.content:
News Analyst on Killings by U.S. Police
 Pyongyang, December 1 (KCNA) -- An increasing number of innocent people have been killed by the police in the United States.
					 As already known, white policemen in Missouri State shot to death two guiltless young black men in August and October this year
					
					 On November 22, a 12-year-old black boy playing with toy gun was shot to death by a white policeman in Cleveland City of Ohio State.
					
					 The facts give a glimpse of the true picture of the U.S. police that does not hesitate to fire bullets at innocent citizens under pretext of "self-defense".
					
					 Such killings by the police are an accepted custom in the U.S. According to data released by the Amnesty International, at least 500 people were killed by the police's shockers in the country from 2001 to February 2012 and 90 percent of those victims were barehanded.
					
					  However, such police murderers remain unpunished and, on the contrary, are defended by the government.
					
					 After all, the killing of people by the police is an inevitable product of the U.S. social system, which legally defends murders under the signboard of freedom and democracy.
					
					 The U.S. talks much about "defense of human rights", but it can never cover up its nature as the worst human rights violator.

articles.title: New Stone Detergents Developed
articles.content:
New Stone Detergents Developed
 Pyongyang, December 1 (KCNA) -- New stone detergents have been developed by an institute under the Ministry of Construction and Building-Materials Industry of the DPRK.
					 In this regard, KCNA met Ju Jong Son, director of the institute.
					
					 Ju said:
					
					 The institute succeeded in developing new stone detergents.
					
					 They were made with locally available materials, giving no adverse effect on environment. The detergents are 20-50 times faster than sandblast in cleansing stones with lower cost.
					
					 They have been already applied to many projects, proving very effective.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Demands Repeal of "Security Law"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Demands Repeal of "Security Law" 
 Pyongyang, December 1 (KCNA) -- 66 years have passed since the fascist "Security Law" was cooked up. Rodong Sinmun Monday runs an article in this regard.
					 On December 1, 1948, traitor Syngman Rhee cooked up the "Security Law," a copy of the "Public Order Act" enforced under the colonial rule of the Japanese imperialists, to suppress and punish those people who opposed the setting up of the "separate government" inviting a national ruin in south Korea, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 Since then the "Security Law" has been retrogressively revised many a time as a tool for maintaining and strengthening the fascist dictatorial system whenever the people's desire for independence, democracy and reunification of the country grew strong and the crisis of the puppet ruling quarters got serious. 
					
					 From the very day of the appearance of the "Security Law" it earned an ill-fame as a tool for the south Korean puppet ruling quarters' stay in power and the elimination of the political opponents and a means for stamping out the people's movement for independence, democracy and reunification. 
					
					 The "Security Law" became more draconian after the present chief executive, descendant of the "yusin" dictatorship, came to power in south Korea.  
					
					 The puppet group revived the "yusin" dictatorship and is brutally suppressing the progressive political parties, organizations and media organs, which conducted legitimate activities in the past, after branding them as "forces following the north" and "forces for overthrowing the system" by invoking the "Security Law". 
					
					 The south Korean puppet ruling quarters have turned south Korea into the world's worst tundra of human rights by invoking the "Security Law." It is shameless, indeed, for them to get frantic with the anti-DPRK campaign together with outside forces over the "human rights" issue. 
					
					 There can be neither democratization of south Korean society nor human rights nor improved north-south relations without the repeal of the "Security Law" against democracy and reunification.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Puppet Group's Suppression of UPP
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Puppet Group's Suppression of UPP 
 Pyongyang, December 1 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the puppet minister of Justice of south Korea labeled the Unified Progressive Party (UPP) the "party following the socialist ideology of the north" and blustered that it is necessary to dissolve the party to "protect liberal democracy". The gentries of the "Saenuri Party" let loose a spate of such absurd sophism as "education in violent revolutionary line based on the Juche idea," crying out for a judgment for dissolving the UPP.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday in a commentary terms this despicable and hideous politically-motivated terrorism to eliminate the progressive democratic forces from the political arena and thus ruthlessly violate and dampen the south Korean people's desire for independence, democracy and reunification and save the dictatorial rule from the evermore deepening crisis and achieve the security of the regime.
					
					 The fact that the freedom of activities of political parties is being ruthlessly trampled down in south Korea in the 21st century is sparking off astonishment of the whole public at home and abroad, the commentary says, adding:
					
					 The puppet forces' racket to dissolve the UPP reminds one of the Hitler fascist clique's barbarous action of fabricating the Reichstag Fire and dissolving the Communist Party by force in the last century.
					
					 The world does not know such barren land of democracy and tundra of human rights as south Korea where moves to disband the progressive political party are openly allowed.
					
					 The puppet group's desperate campaign to dissolve the UPP through a fascist racket for "eliminating the followers of the north" goes to clearly prove that it is hordes of ferocious stranglers of democracy who stoop to any infamy to meet their partisan interests and ensure the security of the regime.

articles.title: Minju Joson Censures U.S. for Updating Its Forces
articles.content:
Minju Joson Censures U.S. for Updating Its Forces 
 Pyongyang, December 1 (KCNA) -- Recently, the U.S. is paying exceptional attention to updating its forces.
					  U.S. Secretary of Defense Hagel in his statement sent to high-ranking military officials of the U.S. before his recent resignation, made the so-called "initiative for innovations in national defense" which calls for proactively applying fresh system and latest technology such as robot technology, miniaturization of weapons and data development and 3D printing technique to the military field, according to foreign press reports.
					
					 Minju Joson Monday runs a commentary in this regard.
					
					 It says:
					
					 This clearly proves that the U.S. remains unchanged in its ambition to realize its scenario for dominating the world through its military hegemony and is getting more persistent in its efforts to realize it.
					
					 At present the U.S. is not in a position to maintain its status as "the world's only superpower" in the international arena and is compelled to leave the "sphere of its control" over the world and "guiding role" to other countries.
					
					 What the U.S. conceived under this scenario is the idea that it should lay the second military springboard without fail.
					
					 In other words, its ulterior aim is to rearm its forces with rapid and sophisticated striking capability and stealth technique and steadily maintain its military edge and position as "the world's only superpower" just as it had dominated the world by manufacturing nuclear weapons during World War â…¡and thus realize its wild ambition for world domination. 
					
					 The U.S. set the development of the delivery system and unmanned system capable of striking the farthest target on the earth from its launching base at the speed several times faster than the sonic one in an hour as its priority task and is working hard to carry it out. It is openly asserting that it will continue seeking and employing means and ways for ensuring its military supremacy in the future, too.
					
					 The U.S. had better stop acting rashly, thinking twice about the miserable consequences to be entailed by its overconfidence in its muscle.

articles.title: Stop to Anti-DPRK Leaflet-scattering Operations Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Stop to Anti-DPRK Leaflet-scattering Operations Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 1 (KCNA) -- Voices demanding a stop to the anti-DPRK leaflet-scattering operations are growing stronger among civic and social organizations, opposition parties and people of all social standings in south Korea, according to south Korean internet newspaper Thongil News on Nov. 28.
					 According to an opinion poll conducted by an opinion survey organ from Nov. 25 to 27, more than 60 percent of the respondents said no to the leaflet-scattering operations.
					
					 Such operations targeting the north have put the inter-Korean relations at the lowest ebb and brought uneasiness and horror to the inhabitants in the area along the Military Demarcation Line, they said.

articles.title: U.S. Policeman's Shooting Black Boy to Death Slammed by S. Korean Broadcasting Service
articles.content:
U.S. Policeman's Shooting Black Boy to Death Slammed by S. Korean Broadcasting Service 
 Pyongyang, December 1 (KCNA) -- A black boy was mercilessly shot to death by a policeman on Nov. 22 against the backdrop of the mounting protest against a white policeman's slaying of a black young man in the U.S.
					 On the day, a policeman shot to death a 12-year-old black boy who was playing a peashooter in a park in Cleveland, Ohio State of the U.S.
					
					 The policeman who rushed to the scene blindly fired his gun at the boy without identifying him or knowing what he was doing.
					
					 The south Korean CBS said in a report about the atrocity committed by the policeman on Nov. 28:
					
					 The U.S. human rights organizations declared they would carry on their protest demonstrations. The deep-rooted conflict between the black and the white and dispute over policemen's excessive use of force in the U.S. are likely to continue for a considerable period.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Posted by Organization of Czech Republic on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Posted by Organization of Czech Republic on Its Website
 Pyongyang, December 1 (KCNA) -- The Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association posted leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Songun-based Revolutionary Line Is a Great Revolutionary Line of Our Era and an Ever-Victorious Banner of Our Revolution" on its website "Paektusan" on November 24.
					 The work, published on January 29, Juche 92 (2003), clarifies the idea that the Songun revolutionary line and Songun politics of the Workers' Party of Korea are a mighty political mode in the present era which carried forward and developed President Kim Il Sung's idea and line of giving importance to the army and a scientific revolutionary line and political mode that most correctly meet the requirements of the times and the revolution.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by European Personages
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by European Personages
 Pyongyang, December 1 (KCNA) -- A remembrance meeting of political parties and organizations in the European region took place in Rome on November 22 on the occasion of the third anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 On display at the venue of the meeting were works of Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un and books introducing Songun Korea.
					
					 Present there were delegates of political parties and organizations in the European region including the Communist Party of Italy, the Socialist Party of Romania, the Revolutionary Communist Party of Britain (Marxist-Leninist), the French Revolutionary Communist League, the Finnish Communists' League, the Communist Party of Malta and the Poland-Korea Association and personages of the European Society for the Study of the Juche Idea.
					
					 The director of the International Department of the Communist Party of Italy said that the achievements made by the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the Korean people would be unthinkable without the energetic leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The chairman of the Italian Committee for the Study of the Juche idea stressed that the distinguished exploit performed by Kim Jong Il for the cause of global independence lies in that he defended the cause of socialism.
					
					 The international secretary of the Central Committee of the French Revolutionary Communist League said that Kim Jong Il developed the WPK into an organizer and guide of all victories of the Korean people.
					
					 Meanwhile, the Communist Party of the People of Spain in its letter sent to the meeting said:
					
					 We extend firm solidarity to the WPK standing in the van of the anti-imperialist struggle.
					
					 The great Comrade Kim Jong Il will always be with progressive mankind.

articles.title: Appeal of International Meeting Supported Abroad
articles.content:
Appeal of International Meeting Supported Abroad
 Pyongyang, December 1 (KCNA) -- A political party of Myanmar and a Pakistani organization released statements on November 27 in support of the appeal of the 16th international meeting of communist parties and workers' parties.
					 The Yangon Regional Committee of the Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar said:
					
					 We received with strong emotion the appeal of the 16th international meeting of communist parties and workers' parties to honor the memory of the great leader HE Kim Jong Il in humblest reverence.
					
					 The Yangon Regional Committee of the Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar will organize various political and cultural events to widely introduce among the people of Myanmar the immortal exploits Kim Jong Il performed for the Korean revolution and the cause of global independence.
					
					 And we will positively support the Workers' Party and people of Korea in their just struggle for carrying out the behests of the great President Kim Il Sung and HE Kim Jong Il under the leadership of the respected HE Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The Pakistani committee for honoring the memory of leader Kim Jong Il noted:
					
					 Although HE Kim Jong Il passed away, the boundless reverence for him is cherished not only by the Korean people but also by the Pakistani people.
					
					 It is the unanimous desire of all of us to significantly organize events for honoring the memory of HE Kim Jong Il.
					
					 We call upon all the political parties, organizations and people of Pakistan to honor the memory of him in the humblest reverence.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Russia
 Pyongyang, December 1 (KCNA) -- A Russian committee for honoring the memory of leader Kim Jong Il was formed by the maritime territory branch of the All-Russia War Veterans' Social Organization "Militant Fraternity" on November 25.
					 Donets, chairman of the branch, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold a remembrance meeting, film show and other political and cultural events to praise Kim Jong Il's revolutionary career and exploits on the occasion of the third anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Nigerian Organizations Support DPRK's Stand
articles.content:
Nigerian Organizations Support DPRK's Stand
 Pyongyang, December 1 (KCNA) -- Nigerian organizations fully supported the statement of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					 The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism in a statement on Nov. 26 recalled that the United States perpetrated such grave politically-motivated provocation as railroading the "resolution on human rights" against the DPRK through the UN by instigating the EU and Japan and setting in motion hand-raising machines through highhanded practice and political and economic pressure.
					
					 It branded it as a political fraud.
					
					 Censuring the "resolution" as the most vivid manifestation of the U.S. hostile attempt to totally stamp out everything dear to the Korean people and other progressives in the world, it continued:
					
					 We extend firm support and solidarity to the government and people of the DPRK in their struggle to defend the sovereignty of the country which is dearer than their lives.
					
					 We will invariably stand on the side of the Korean people who are dynamically advancing toward the final victory under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The Nigeria-Korea Friendship Association noted in a statement on Nov. 25:
					
					 We totally deny and reject the anti-DPRK "human rights resolution" which the U.S. and other hostile forces railroaded through the UN by high-handed and arbitrary practices, appeasement and deception in a bid to encroach upon the sovereignty of the DPRK and the vital rights of the Korean people under the pretext of non-existent human rights issue.
					
					 We strongly call on the member states of the UN which set store by justice and conscience never to follow the moves of the U.S. and other hostile forces keen on heinous "human rights" campaign aimed to hurt the sovereignty of the DPRK.

articles.title: Bulgarian Political Personage Denounces U.S. and Its Followers' "Human Rights" Campaign against DPRK
articles.content:
Bulgarian Political Personage Denounces U.S. and Its Followers' "Human Rights" Campaign against DPRK
 Pyongyang, December 1 (KCNA) -- Atanas Ivanov, honorary chairman of the Bulgarian Communists Union, released a statement on Nov. 26 in denunciation of the vicious anti-DPRK "human rights" campaign kicked up by the U.S. and its followers.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The U.S. and its followers perpetrated such a provocation as cooking up a "human rights resolution" to malignantly defame the DPRK.
					
					 The "resolution" peppered with false information presented by those who deserted their hometowns and families after perpetrating unpardonable crimes before the country and its people is quite contrary to the reality in the DPRK.
					
					 The people in the DPRK are fully enjoying their political, economic and cultural rights.
					
					 It is no more than a tragicomedy that the U.S. sponsored the fabrication of the "resolution" although it has no qualification to talk about human rights.
					
					 The purpose of the U.S. "human rights" campaign is to topple the socialist system in the DPRK.
					
					 We vehemently denounce the U.S. and its followers' human rights campaign against the DPRK.
					
					 The statement urged them to stop at once their "human rights" campaign against the DPRK.

articles.title: Declaran comites de promocion N-S por competencia de futbol de obreros
articles.content:
Declaran comites de promocion N-S por competencia de futbol de obreros
Pyongyang, 1 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Los Comites de Promocion de la parte Nortena y Surena por la Competencia de Futbol de Reunificacion de los Obreros del Norte y el Sur hicieron publica este lunes la declaracion conjunta tras proclamar solemnemente la voluntad de organizar a toda costa la competencia de futbol de reunificacion de los obreros del Norte y el Sur el ano proximo en que se cumpliran el 70o aniversario de la Liberacion de la Patria, el 70o de la division nacional y el 15o de la publicacion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio.
					Todos los obreros de ambas partes coreanas tienen el unico deseo de dar punto final en 2015 a la desconfianza y la confrontacion y abrir la segunda epoca de la reunificacion del 15 de junio penetrada por la reconciliacion, la unidad, la paz y la reunificacion.
					
					Asi inicia el documento y continua:
					
					Primero, bajo la bandera de la declaracion conjunta Norte-Sur lucharemos en la delantera por el contacto, el viaje reciproco y el encuentro de reunificacion.
					
					Los obreros de ambas partes coreanas realizaran sin falta en 2015 el encuentro de reunificacion sin doblegarse ante cualesquier obstaculos y dificultades.
					
					Esta cita sera el inicio del movimiento del ano siguiente por la reconciliacion nacional, la paz y la reunificacion. El encuentro de reunificacion entre los obreros N-S en el primero de mayo del ano siguiente constituira el punto de partida para hacer de los actos de reunificacion por el 70o aniversario de la Liberacion de la Patria y el 15o de la declaracion conjunta del 15 de junio los lugares de gran festival  pannacional de reunificacion.
					
					Segundo, los obreros de ambas partes coreanas seran ejemplos en las actividades solidarias y practicas por la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					En 2015, los obreros N-S se haran otra vez hermano mayor de la reunificacion y ejemplo de la solidaridad y su ejecucion.
					
					Desde hoy, con la conviccion y confianza y con las fuerzas unidades de los obreros N-S, desplegaremos todas las actividades practicas para organizar sin falta la competencia de futbol de reunificacion.
					
					Incorporaremos a las entidades y las personalidades de distintas clases y capas  aspirantes a la competencia de futbol y libraremos sin cesar la lucha contra todos los estorbos que impiden la apertura del torneo.
					
					Tercero, exhortamos a todas las clases y capas aspirantes a la paz y la reunificacion a apoyar a la inauguracion de la competencia y participar en esta cita junto con nosotros.
					
					En el camino de la reunificacion no existe la diferencia de la idea y el ideal. Ante la paz todas las clases y capas son iguales.
					
					Los obreros N-S deben solidarizarse y unirse con las distintas clases y capas por encima de las diferencias de ideas, ideales, criterios politicos y creencias religiosas, para formar una corriente pannacional por la paz y la reunificacion.
					
					Los obreros N-S seran la fuente motriz mas fuerte en celebrar significativamente el ano 2015 con las fuerzas unidas.
					
					Reafirmamos que la competencia de futbol del ano siguiente sera un motivo importante tanto para la mejora de las relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas como para la activacion del estrecho intercambio y cooperacion  y la animacion del clima de la reconciliacion y la unidad nacionales y la paz.
					
					La reunificacion ya se ha hecho la innegable orden de la historia.
					
					Todos los obreros de ambas partes coreanas declaran que cumpliran con toda su responsabilidad y papel asumidos ante si.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente centroafricano
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente centroafricano 
Pyongyang, 1 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Kim Yong Nam, presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea envio el dia primero un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de la Republica Centroafricana, Catherine Samba-panza, con motivo del 56o aniversario de la fundacion de este pais.
					El remitente desea al destinatario y su pueblo los exitos en los esfuerzos por la unidad nacional, la estabilidad y el desarrollo economico y expresa su conviccion de que se consolidaran y se desarrollaran invariablemente las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises.

articles.title: Prosiguen en RPDC mitines de militares y civiles
articles.content:
Prosiguen en RPDC mitines de militares y civiles
Pyongyang, 1 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar en la provincia de Ryanggang y en las ciudades y distritos de diferentes localidades del pais los mitines de militares y civiles para apoyar la declaracion del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y frustrar la campana de "DDHH" anti-RPDC de Estados Unidos y sus satelites. 
					En las ocasiones fue leida la declaracion del CDN de la RPDC. 
					
					Hubo discursos de los representantes de los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea, los obreros, los trabajadores agricolas y los jovenes y estudiantes. 
					
					Los oradores denunciaron categoricamente la resolucion de "DDHH" anti-RPDC fabricada por EE.UU. con despotismo y arbitrariedades.
					
					Dijeron que no se puede existir nunca el "problema de DDHH" en el regimen socialista coreano donde se aseguran al maximo la dignidad y los intereses de los seres humanos y se realizan los suenos e ideales del pueblo. 
					
					Aseveraron que pasa el limite alarmante la imprudente ofensiva de EE.UU. y sus satelites encaminada a exterminar el regimen socialista coreano, cuna de vida del pueblo coreano. 
					
					Destacaron que tambien tiene limite la paciencia de nuestro ejercito y pueblo y advirtieron que no perdonaran jamas a los provocadores. 
					
					Apuntaron que no se puede frustrar por nada la justa causa de nuestro ejercito y pueblo levantados como un solo hombre en la sagrada guerra de venganza para frustrar la brutal campana de "DDHH" de EE.UU. y sus seguidores. 
					
					Terminados los mitines, tuvieron lugar las marchas de los participantes.

articles.title: Tiene lugar acto por Dia Mundial de SIDA
articles.content:
Tiene lugar acto por Dia Mundial de SIDA
Pyongyang, 1 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia primero en el capitalino Palacio Cultural del Pueblo el acto por el Dia Mundial de SIDA con la participacion de los funcionarios de la rama de salud publica y otros sectores, el representante de la Organizacion Mundial de la Salud (OMS), el coordinador permanente de la ONU y representante permanente del Programa de las Naciones Unidas para el Desarrollo y los miembros de la representaciones de organizaciones internacionales y los representantes diplomaticos, acreditados en Corea.
					En el acto hubo intervenciones.
					
					Los oradores se refirieron al tema del Dia Mundial de SIDA de este ano fijado por la OMS y subrayaron la importancia de la labor para los contagiados y los muertos por SIDA y asegurar los derechos de los infectados.
					
					Destacaron que se debe prevenir la infeccion y la transmision de SIDA desplegando activamente la propaganda higienica y las actividades de vigilancia para la prevencion de esa enfermedad.
					
					En el acto se informo del estado de las actividades realizadas en Corea para prevenir y controlar SIDA.
					
					A continuacion, los participantes vieron multimedia que da a conocer la prevencion de SIDA y el virus Ebola y la funcion artistica ofrecida por el grupo de propaganda higienica de los alumnos.
					
					El mismo dia, en los centros de propaganda higienica de la central y las provincias se realizaron las actividades de propaganda por la prevencion de SIDA.

articles.title: Imperialismo norteamericano debe ser eliminado para la supervivencia de humanidad
articles.content:
Imperialismo norteamericano debe ser eliminado para la supervivencia de humanidad
Pyongyang, 1 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Hoy dia, el virus Ebola amenaza seriamente la vida de la humanidad, pero el factor mas amenazante es el imperialismo yanqui que engendro ese mal.
					Asi dijo el jefe de departamento del Comite Central de la Asociacion de la Cruz Roja de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Hyok Hwan, y continuo:
					
					Recientemente, se conocio que el inventor de Ebola es precisamente Estados Unidos y este hecho deja consternada la sociedad internacional.
					
					A fin de tomar heguemonia mundial, el imperialismo yanqui vino desarrollando las armas biologicas con una "historia fetida", como expresara el ex asesor de Reagan, y en ese curso, invento el virus original de Ebola.
					
					Un profesor de universidad de Liberia revelo que el Pentagono pago 140 millones de dolares a una compania farmaceutica extranjera para el desarrollo de Ebola y tomo los paises africanos como campos de experimentos de arma biologica.
					
					Los medios de prensa del mundo reportaron que la transmision de Ebola comenzo despues de que los llamados "medicos sin fronteras" de EE.UU. realizaran viaje a los paises africanos.
					
					Los periodicos de Rusia, Singapur y EE.UU. transmitieron que EE.UU invento la vacuna anti-Ebola, pero no la pone en publicidad esperando el tiempo que le de mayores ganancias.
					
					Como ya reconocio el Departamento de Salud Publica e Higiene norteamericano, el imperialismo yanqui realizo desde hace mucho tiempo las pruebas de epidemias mortales con seres vivos para fabricar armas bacteriologicas.
					
					Asi fue inventado tambien el SIDA que se gano la mala fama de peste del siglo pasado.
					
					Para colmo, el imperio no vacilo en exterminar con bomba atomica a cientos de miles de habitantes y experimentar la bomba H usando a los pescadores pacificos como conejillos de Indias.
					
					Como saben todos, EE.UU. tiene el arsenal nuclear mas grande del mundo.
					
					Tal imperio esta acusando cinicamente el supuesto "problema de DDHH" de otro pais abusando de las organizaciones internacionales.
					
					El mundo no estara en paz ni prosperara sin castigar al imperialismo norteamericano.
					
					Para la supervivencia de la humanidad, los pueblos pacifistas del mundo y todas las organizaciones, entidades y medios de prensa, que aspiran a la justicia, deben levantarse en la lucha por eliminar al imperio yanqui, antro de todos los males.
